title: Where Are These Games?!
description:
Where is Hollow Knight and Kingdom Hearts 4?! 

From this episode of Kinda Funny Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LbxaIZAutmA  

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses. 

Go to http://harrys.com/KINDAFUNNY for a $3 Trial Set. 

Go listen to A Better Paradise today, and don't forget to follow it on your platform of choice to make sure you never miss an episode! 

0:00:00 - Hollow Knight 
0:06:06 - Ad 
0:09:19 - Kingdom Hearts 4

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
---------------------------------------------------  
YouTube: Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kindafunny/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kindafunnyvids/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames?lang=en
